=head1 NAME

DiaColloDB::Client::http - diachronic collocation db: client: remote http server

=cut

##========================================================================
## DESCRIPTION
=pod

=head1 DESCRIPTION

DiaColloDB::Client::http is a subclass of
L<DiaColloDB::Client|DiaColloDB::Client> for
accessing a remote L<DiaColloDB|DiaColloDB> database
via an C<http://> URL.
It supports the L<DiaColloDB::Client|DiaColloDB::Client> API
by sending HTTP GET requests to the remote server residing
at the given URL.
by calling the underlying L<DiaColloDB|DiaColloDB> methods
on its C<db> object key.

new() options and object structure:

 ##-- DiaColloDB::Client: options
 url  => $url,           ##-- remote url
 ##
 ##-- DiaColloDB::Client::http: options
 user => $user,          ##-- for LWP::UserAgent basic authentication
 password => $password,  ##-- for LWP::UserAgent basic authentication
 logRequest => $log,     ##-- log-level for HTTP requests (default:'debug')
 ##
 ##-- DiaColloDB::Client::http: guts
 ua   => $ua,            ##-- underlying LWP::UserAgent

Local options to the DiaColloDB::Client::http object can be passed
as URL-encoded parameters in query part of the argument URL.

=cut
